com.analog.lyric.options

Class LocalOptionHolder

  • java.lang.Object
    • com.analog.lyric.options.AbstractOptionHolder
      • com.analog.lyric.options.LocalOptionHolder
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    IOptionHolder
    Direct Known Subclasses:
    DimpleOptionHolder

    public class LocalOptionHolder
extends AbstractOptionHolder
    Provides standard implementation of IOptionHolder methods.

    Extends AbstractOptionHolder with local options and additional methods for getting and setting options on this object.

    Since:
    0.07

        public LocalOptionHolder()

    • Method Detail

      • clearLocalOptions

        public void clearLocalOptions()
        Clears all local options.

        Unsets all options set directly on this object. This does not affect option settings on other option holders in the delegate chain.

        This implementation removes the underlying local option map.

      • getLocalOptions

        public java.util.Collection<IOption<? extends java.io.Serializable>> getLocalOptions()
        Description copied from interface: IOptionHolder
        Read-only collection describing options that are set directly on this object.

        This does not include options set on delegates.

      • getLocalOption

        @Nullable
public <T extends java.io.Serializable> T getLocalOption(IOptionKey<T> key)
        Description copied from interface: IOptionHolder
        Returns value of option with given key if set directly on this object, else null.

        Parameters:
        key - is a non-null option key.

      • setOption

        public <T extends java.io.Serializable> void setOption(IOptionKey<T> key,
                                              T value)
        Description copied from interface: IOptionHolder
        Sets option locally with given key to specified value.

        Parameters:
        key - is a non-null option key.
        value - is a non-null value with type compatible with key's type.

      • supportsLocalOptions

        public boolean supportsLocalOptions()
        Indicates whether object supports local storage of options.

        If true, then option values may be set directly on this object using the IOptionHolder.setOption(com.analog.lyric.options.IOptionKey<T>, T) method; otherwise that method will throw an exception.

        This implementation returns true.

      • unsetOption

        public void unsetOption(IOptionKey<?> key)
        Description copied from interface: IOptionHolder
        Unsets local option with given key.

        Removes option setting on this object for given key if such a setting exists. This does not affect option settings on other objects.

        Parameters:
        key - is a non-null option key.

      • createLocalOptionMap

        protected java.util.concurrent.ConcurrentMap<IOptionKey<?>,java.lang.Object> createLocalOptionMap()

protected java.util.concurrent.ConcurrentMap<IOptionKey<?>,java.lang.Object> getLocalOptionMap(boolean create)
